verses.text_plain: And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
verses.verse_html: 1And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.text_plain: Son of man, set thy face toward Jerusalem, and drop thy word toward the holy places, and prophesy against the land of Israel,
verses.verse_html: 2Son of man, set thy face toward Jerusalem, and drop thy word toward the holy places, and prophesy against the land of Israel,

verses.text_plain: And say to the land of Israel, Thus saith the Lord; Behold, I am against thee, and will draw forth my sword out of his sheath, and will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked.
verses.verse_html: 3And say to the land of Israel, Thus saith the Lord; Behold, I am against thee, and will draw forth my sword out of his sheath, and will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked.

tokens.text: against thee, and will draw forth

verses.text_plain: Seeing then that I will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked, therefore shall my sword go forth out of his sheath against all flesh from the south to the north:
verses.verse_html: 4Seeing then that I will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked, therefore shall my sword go forth out of his sheath against all flesh from the south to the north:

tokens.text: then that I will cut off

verses.text_plain: That all flesh may know that I the Lord have drawn forth my sword out of his sheath: it shall not return any more.
verses.verse_html: 5That all flesh may know that I the Lord have drawn forth my sword out of his sheath: it shall not return any more.

verses.text_plain: Sigh therefore, thou son of man, with the breaking of thy loins; and with bitterness sigh before their eyes.
verses.verse_html: 6Sigh therefore, thou son of man, with the breaking of thy loins; and with bitterness sigh before their eyes.

verses.text_plain: And it shall be, when they say unto thee, Wherefore sighest thou? that thou shalt answer, For the tidings; because it cometh: and every heart shall melt, and all hands shall be feeble, and every spirit shall faint, and all knees shall be weak as water: behold, it cometh, and shall be brought to pass, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html:
7And it shall be, when they say unto thee, Wherefore sighest thou? that thou shalt answer, For the tidings; because it cometh: and every heart shall melt, and all hands shall be feeble, and every spirit shall faint, and all knees shall be weak as water: behold, it cometh, and shall be brought to pass, saith the Lord God. ▼
▼ shall be weak…: Heb. shall go into water

tokens.text: And it shall be, when they say
and shall be brought to pass

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shall be weak…: Heb. shall go into water
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shall be weak…: Heb. shall go into water

verses.text_plain: Again the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
verses.verse_html: 8Again the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.text_plain: Son of man, prophesy, and say, Thus saith the Lord; Say, A sword, a sword is sharpened, and also furbished:
verses.verse_html: 9Son of man, prophesy, and say, Thus saith the Lord; Say, A sword, a sword is sharpened, and also furbished:

verses.text_plain: It is sharpened to make a sore slaughter; it is furbished that it may glitter: should we then make mirth? it contemneth the rod of my son, as every tree.
verses.verse_html:
10It is sharpened to make a sore slaughter; it is furbished that it may glitter: should we then make mirth? it contemneth the rod of my son, as every tree. ▼
▼ it contemneth…: or, it is the rod of my son, it despiseth every tree

footnotes.body_text: ▼ it contemneth…: or, it is the rod of my son, it despiseth every tree
footnotes.body_html: ▼ it contemneth…: or, it is the rod of my son, it despiseth every tree

verses.text_plain: And he hath given it to be furbished, that it may be handled: this sword is sharpened, and it is furbished, to give it into the hand of the slayer.
verses.verse_html: 11And he hath given it to be furbished, that it may be handled: this sword is sharpened, and it is furbished, to give it into the hand of the slayer.

verses.text_plain: Cry and howl, son of man: for it shall be upon my people, it shall be upon all the princes of Israel: terrors by reason of the sword shall be upon my people: smite therefore upon thy thigh.
verses.verse_html:
12Cry and howl, son of man: for it shall be upon my people, it shall be upon all the princes of Israel: terrors by reason of the sword shall be upon my people: smite therefore upon thy thigh. ▼
▼ terrors…: or, they are thrust down to the sword with my people

tokens.text: for it shall be upon my people

footnotes.body_text: ▼ terrors…: or, they are thrust down to the sword with my people
footnotes.body_html: ▼ terrors…: or, they are thrust down to the sword with my people

verses.text_plain: Because it is a trial, and what if the sword contemn even the rod? it shall be no more, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html:
13Because it is a trial, and what if the sword contemn even the rod? it shall be no more, saith the Lord God. ▼
▼ Because…: or, When the trial hath been, what then? shall they not also belong to the despising rod?

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Because…: or, When the trial hath been, what then? shall they not also belong to the despising rod?
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Because…: or, When the trial hath been, what then? shall they not also belong to the despising rod?

verses.text_plain: Thou therefore, son of man, prophesy, and smite thine hands together, and let the sword be doubled the third time, the sword of the slain: it is the sword of the great men that are slain, which entereth into their privy chambers.
verses.verse_html:
14Thou therefore, son of man, prophesy, and smite thine hands together, and let the sword be doubled the third time, the sword of the slain: it is the sword of the great men that are slain, which entereth into their privy chambers. ▼
▼ hands…: Heb. hand to hand

tokens.text: which entereth into their privy chambers

footnotes.body_html: ▼ hands…: Heb. hand to hand

verses.text_plain: I have set the point of the sword against all their gates, that their heart may faint, and their ruins be multiplied: ah! it is made bright, it is wrapped up for the slaughter.
verses.verse_html:
15I have set the point of the sword against all their gates, that their heart may faint, and their ruins be multiplied: ah! it is made bright, it is wrapped up for the slaughter. ▼
▼ point: or, glittering, or, fear
 , ▼
▼ wrapped up: or, sharpened

footnotes.body_html: ▼ point: or, glittering, or, fear
▼ wrapped up: or, sharpened

verses.text_plain: Go thee one way or other, either on the right hand, or on the left, whithersoever thy face is set.
verses.verse_html:
16Go thee one way or other, either on the right hand, or on the left, whithersoever thy face is set. ▼
▼ or on…: Heb. set thyself, take the left hand

tokens.text: Go thee one way or other

footnotes.body_text: ▼ or on…: Heb. set thyself, take the left hand
footnotes.body_html: ▼ or on…: Heb. set thyself, take the left hand

verses.text_plain: I will also smite mine hands together, and I will cause my fury to rest: I the Lord have said it.
verses.verse_html: 17I will also smite mine hands together, and I will cause my fury to rest: I the Lord have said it.

tokens.text: and I will cause my fury

verses.text_plain: The word of the Lord came unto me again, saying,
verses.verse_html: 18The word of the Lord came unto me again, saying,

verses.text_plain: Also, thou son of man, appoint thee two ways, that the sword of the king of Babylon may come: both twain shall come forth out of one land: and choose thou a place, choose it at the head of the way to the city.
verses.verse_html: 19Also, thou son of man, appoint thee two ways, that the sword of the king of Babylon may come: both twain shall come forth out of one land: and choose thou a place, choose it at the head of the way to the city.

verses.text_plain: Appoint a way, that the sword may come to Rabbath of the Ammonites, and to Judah in Jerusalem the defenced.
verses.verse_html: 20Appoint a way, that the sword may come to Rabbath of the Ammonites, and to Judah in Jerusalem the defenced.

verses.text_plain: For the king of Babylon stood at the parting of the way, at the head of the two ways, to use divination: he made his arrows bright, he consulted with images, he looked in the liver.
verses.verse_html:
21For the king of Babylon stood at the parting of the way, at the head of the two ways, to use divination: he made his arrows bright, he consulted with images, he looked in the liver. ▼
▼ parting of: Heb. mother of
 , ▼
▼ arrows: or, knives
 , ▼
▼ images: Heb. teraphim

footnotes.body_html: ▼ parting of: Heb. mother of

verses.text_plain: At his right hand was the divination for Jerusalem, to appoint captains, to open the mouth in the slaughter, to lift up the voice with shouting, to appoint battering rams against the gates, to cast a mount, and to build a fort.
verses.verse_html:
22At his right hand was the divination for Jerusalem, to appoint captains, to open the mouth in the slaughter, to lift up the voice with shouting, to appoint battering rams against the gates, to cast a mount, and to build a fort. ▼
▼ captains: or, battering rams: Heb. rams

footnotes.body_text: ▼ captains: or, battering rams: Heb. rams
footnotes.body_html: ▼ captains: or, battering rams: Heb. rams

verses.text_plain: And it shall be unto them as a false divination in their sight, to them that have sworn oaths: but he will call to remembrance the iniquity, that they may be taken.
verses.verse_html:
23And it shall be unto them as a false divination in their sight, to them that have sworn oaths: but he will call to remembrance the iniquity, that they may be taken. ▼
▼ to them…: or, for the oaths made unto them

tokens.text: And it shall be unto them as a false
but he will call to remembrance

footnotes.body_text: ▼ to them…: or, for the oaths made unto them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ to them…: or, for the oaths made unto them

verses.text_plain: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Because ye have made your iniquity to be remembered, in that your transgressions are discovered, so that in all your doings your sins do appear; because, I say, that ye are come to remembrance, ye shall be taken with the hand.
verses.verse_html: 24Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Because ye have made your iniquity to be remembered, in that your transgressions are discovered, so that in all your doings your sins do appear; because, I say, that ye are come to remembrance, ye shall be taken with the hand.

tokens.text: Because ye have made your iniquity
so that in all your doings
that ye are come to remembrance

verses.text_plain: And thou, profane wicked prince of Israel, whose day is come, when iniquity shall have an end,
verses.verse_html: 25And thou, profane wicked prince of Israel, whose day is come, when iniquity shall have an end,

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord God; Remove the diadem, and take off the crown: this shall not be the same: exalt him that is low, and abase him that is high.
verses.verse_html: 26Thus saith the Lord God; Remove the diadem, and take off the crown: this shall not be the same: exalt him that is low, and abase him that is high.

verses.text_plain: I will overturn, overturn, overturn, it: and it shall be no more, until he come whose right it is; and I will give it him.
verses.verse_html:
27I will overturn, overturn, overturn, it: and it shall be no more, until he come whose right it is; and I will give it him. ▼
▼ I will overturn…: Heb. Perverted, perverted, perverted, will I make it

tokens.text: it is; and I will give

footnotes.body_text: ▼ I will overturn…: Heb. Perverted, perverted, perverted, will I make it
footnotes.body_html: ▼ I will overturn…: Heb. Perverted, perverted, perverted, will I make it

verses.text_plain: And thou, son of man, prophesy and say, Thus saith the Lord God concerning the Ammonites, and concerning their reproach; even say thou, The sword, the sword is drawn: for the slaughter it is furbished, to consume because of the glittering:
verses.verse_html: 28And thou, son of man, prophesy and say, Thus saith the Lord God concerning the Ammonites, and concerning their reproach; even say thou, The sword, the sword is drawn: for the slaughter it is furbished, to consume because of the glittering:

verses.text_plain: Whiles they see vanity unto thee, whiles they divine a lie unto thee, to bring thee upon the necks of them that are slain, of the wicked, whose day is come, when their iniquity shall have an end.
verses.verse_html: 29Whiles they see vanity unto thee, whiles they divine a lie unto thee, to bring thee upon the necks of them that are slain, of the wicked, whose day is come, when their iniquity shall have an end.

verses.text_plain: Shall I cause it to return into his sheath? I will judge thee in the place where thou wast created, in the land of thy nativity.
verses.verse_html:
30Shall I cause it to return into his sheath? I will judge thee in the place where thou wast created, in the land of thy nativity. ▼
▼ Shall…: or, Cause it to return

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Shall…: or, Cause it to return
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Shall…: or, Cause it to return

verses.text_plain: And I will pour out mine indignation upon thee, I will blow against thee in the fire of my wrath, and deliver thee into the hand of brutish men, and skilful to destroy.
verses.verse_html:
31And I will pour out mine indignation upon thee, I will blow against thee in the fire of my wrath, and deliver thee into the hand of brutish men, and skilful to destroy. ▼
▼ brutish: or, burning

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt be for fuel to the fire; thy blood shall be in the midst of the land; thou shalt be no more remembered: for I the Lord have spoken it.
verses.verse_html: 32Thou shalt be for fuel to the fire; thy blood shall be in the midst of the land; thou shalt be no more remembered: for I the Lord have spoken it.
